detail_desc: Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections and a racer back. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Set with a vest top and shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Vest top with a racer back. Shorts with a contrasting colour waistband.

Set with a top and pair of shorts. Flutter-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short shorts in cotton crêpe jersey with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist. The cotton content of the set is organic.

Short top in a stretch weave with a sweetheart neckline, smocking at the back and gathered, vertical seams at the front to create a draped effect. Short, elasticated puff sleeves in airy organza and elastication over the shoulders. Jersey lining at the front.
